metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3467 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in the DER decoder in GNU Libtasn1before 3.6, as used in GnuTLS, allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read) via crafted ASN.1 data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3467` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtasn1-3-bin - 3.4-3ubuntu0.1
libtasn1-6 - 3.4-3ubuntu0.1
libtasn1-bin - 3.4-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4-3ubuntu0.1').
